invocations.description: Returns the last count of item itename in your depot and mail inbox. Returns 0 if itemname is not recognized. The item does not need to be visible to count items this way.
invocations.exDescription:
Will show how many 'Crystalline Arrows' you have in your depot. Will count items in your equipment slots.
Info: In order to use this function you must first open the market. If you modify the contents of the depot, this function will not update until the market is opened again.
